PIPETTE: Oh, what shall I do? What if the
sergeant comes before they get back?
I don’t know how to welcome a brave
soldier. I hate men anyway. They
are so - so fond of staring at one
(PETER STARES AT HER) and putting
their arms about one’s waist* (PETER
DOES SO) and squeezing one’s hand
(PETER SQUEEZES).
PETER! That’s the way they are all right.
I’ve done it myself.
